featured.text: Folk tales are both down-to-earth and highly imaginative.
With the imaginative assistance of Dooley, Peanuts discovers the healing power of hope and love.

definition.zh_def: 富有想像力的，創造性的。
definition.en_def: Having a creative or inventive mind; able to think of new ideas.
definition.example: The imaginative story captivated the children and sparked their creativity.
